# isBigInt() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert](./esdmr.assert.md) &gt; [isBigInt](./esdmr.assert.isbigint.md)


Asserts that the given value is a big integer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isBigInt(value: unknown): asserts value is bigint;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | Value to assert. |

<b>Returns:</b>

asserts value is bigint
